login.redirecting: User is not logged in, redirecting to login page

login.title: Login
login.loginPrompt: Enter your email below to login to your account.
login.description: A dual-column login page. The left side contains the login form with email and password fields, a forgot password link, and a sign up link. The right side has a cover image.
login.emailError: Please enter a valid email address.
login.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
login.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
login.loginFailed: Login failed, please check your account and password.
login.unknownError: An unknown error occurred, please try again later.

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.description: A sign up page with two columns. The first column has the sign up form with email, username, password, confirm password, display name, bio, location, phone number, birth date, captcha and terms of service checkbox. The second column has a cover image.
signUp.termsNotAgreed: Please agree to the terms of service first.
signUp.signUpPromptDescription: Please fill in the following information to create a new account.
signUp.agreeToTerms: I have read and agree to
signUp.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
signUp.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
signUp.captchaSendError: Failed to send captcha, please try again later.
signUp.captchaSentDescription: Please check your email or SMS for the captcha.
signUp.unknownError: An unknown error occurred, please try again later.
signUp.successRegisterDescription: Please log in with your new account.
signUp.agreeToTermsChanged: Agree to terms of service status changed

forgotPassword.description: Please enter your email address to reset your password.
forgotPassword.successMessage: Verification code has been sent, please check your email.
forgotPassword.errorMessage: Failed to send verification code, please try again later.
forgotPassword.captchaSentDescription: Please check your email or SMS for the verification code.
forgotPassword.captchaSendError: Failed to send verification code, please try again later.
forgotPassword.unknownError: An unknown error occurred, please try again later.
forgotPassword.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
forgotPassword.emailAlreadyVerified: This email address has already been verified, please use another email address.
forgotPassword.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
forgotPassword.resetPasswordSuccessDescription: Please log in with your new password.
forgotPassword.resetPasswordError: Failed to reset password, please try again later.
forgotPassword.forgotPasswordPrompt: Forgot password? Please enter your email address to reset your password.
forgotPassword.emailDescription: Please enter the email address you used to register.
forgotPassword.newPasswordDescription: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long.
forgotPassword.confirmPasswordDescription: Please re-enter your new password to confirm.
forgotPassword.captchaDescription: Please enter the captcha you received.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Please read the following terms of service and privacy policy carefully.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using this service, you agree to comply with these terms. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use this service.

accounts.title: 2. Account Responsibilities
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security and confidentiality of your account information. Any activity conducted through your account will be deemed to be carried out by you.

conduct.title: 3. User Conduct
conduct.alertTitle: 3. Warning: Please note that you agree not to engage in any of the following behaviors, or you will bear corresponding responsibilities:
conduct.content: You agree not to engage in any behavior that may damage, disable, overburden, or interfere with this service.

termination.title: 4. Termination of Service
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access at any time, with or without notice.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some frequently asked questions and their answers.

q1.question: Can I change my email address?
q1.answer: Yes, you can change your email address in your account settings.

q2.question: What should I do if I forget my password?
q2.answer: You can reset your password by clicking the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.

q3.question: How can I delete my account?
q3.answer: Please contact customer support to request account deletion.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: View your account information and statistics here.

security.title: Security Settings
security.description: Modify your account security settings here.
